I'm probably gonna only use this journal for depressing crap and probably none of you are gonna read it cuz I think that you changed my lj to eyeofthedrgn and yeah, whatever..I really don't care, nobody cares...so whatever..

anyway, I feel like crap, emotionally and physically...it's great...

anyway, yeah, that's all...

I will be posting at silverwulf, because of one reason that will go unmentioned.
I may post here every so often to get out more personal feelings, but other than that, if you want updates, I don't know who would, but they'll be at silverwulf
It's better to have loved and lost, than to have never loved at all.

it snowed like 4 inches yesterday!!!! it was so awesome!!! but they wouldn't let us leave school...it sucked.... yeah, anyway, I'm going to Westwind this weekend! wo0t! so happy! now, it only I could take Mack...that would be awesome... so I'll be gone all weekend...farther away from Mack...blah, it sucks I just hope I getta talk to him before I leave...

our phone is fucked up...there's no dial tone...it sucks!!!!  so I'm at Meghan's right now...so I can't really post all the crap that I wanna post...I'll hafta do that for...I lost my train of thought...damn it...oh well...talk at ya'll'z laterz

hugs and kisses
love alwayz
- amber -

me and Tara are fine. when I got home we talked it out and yeah. this last week has been hell because of night rehearsals. I'm stressed out because of all the rehearsals and the fact that we have mock interviews on thursday. I haven't talked to Mack in a week.....mostly because I haven't been online...and he hasn't emailed me...... yeah, life is a bitch right now...it's just lovely... Halloween was kind of boring...we had a late start on trick-pr-treating, it was great and we froze our asses off, it was great fun. Elisa's Halloween party was fun. some of us played guilotine..or however you spell it..then after some of us went into the garage and kind of had a dance party with some of my techno crap. then everything just kind of turned perverted after that...it was great fun.

My life is rated PG.

school computers suck, like seriously...one computer ate my disk...then my story that's on my dish got all fucked up...*beats the crap out of all school computers* gah! they drive me insane!!! I can't stand 'em!

yeah, anyway, Tara yelled at me this morning after we got to school.  because I told her to stop thinking about going into the Navy and being in love with Justin.  She said she can't, but yet she wasn't thinking about it at the bus stop or at least she was showing it because she was all perky cuz she got some last night.  yeah, so I got yelled at, I was almost in tears as I walked to my drawing class.  today has just kind of sucked.  I was just fine until Tara yelled at me, but no, she had to go and make my day a piece of shit.  

isn't life just the greatest thing in the world?  yeah, that's what I thought too x_x anyway I can't print out my paper that's due before 3:30 because school computers are a piece of crap.  none of the computers..er at least the ones I've been on which is 3, won't read my disk and it's pissing me off.   blah, life sucks, yup yup it does.

yeah, I have to print out my story and I can't, and it sucks.  it does, like majorly.  *Sigh* I should probably go figure out how I can print my story before school gets out.  so talk at ya'll'z laters

hugs an' kisses
love alwayz
- amber -

yeah, I really don't know...only that I'm in a better mood since I talked to Mack yesterday, yeah...I really really like how the Scarlet Shroud came out...it looks really really kewl..yeah...

clarinet lessons went all right, school was boring...like always...uhh...yeah

the whole Scarlet Shroud thing is Mack's band, I asked if I could make the design thing for it and yeah..that one was my favorite out of all the ones I made, so yeah..

there's night rehearsals all this week...fun...I'm gonna be so drained, so I may not post for a week, but then, I think mom said that I could go home and she could take me back to the school, but I'm not sure....yeah, I can't wait til the hell rehearsal....that'll be fun x_x yeah anyway, that's all for now, talk at ya'll'z laters

hugs an' kisses

You are Form 9, Vampire: The Undying. "And The Vampire was all that remained on
the blood drowned creation. She attempted to
regrow life from the dead. But as she was
about to give the breath of life, she was
consumed in the flame of The Phoenix and the
cycle began again." Some examples of the Vampire Form are Hades (Greek)
and Isis (Egyptian). The Vampire is associated with the concept of
death, the number 9, and the element of fire. Her sign is the eclipsed moon. As a member of Form 9, you are a very realistic
individual. You may be a little idealistic,
but you are very grounded and down to earth.
You realize that not everything lasts, but you
savor every minute of the good times. While
you may sometimes find yourself lonely, you
have strong ties with people that will never be
broken. Vampires are the best friends to have
because they are sensible.

Which Mythological Form Are You?
brought to you by Quizilla This one's just here cuz I thought it was interesting because Demeter is a Elfin form...jus' thought it was interesting You are Form 6, Elfin: The Wyld. "And The Elfin saw the evil and misjudgement in the world and shot her arrow at the sky. Bolts of lightning struck the earth and gave the world balance and growth." Some examples of the Elfin Form are Demeter (Greek) and Khepry (Egyptian). The Elfin is associated with the concept of growth and balance, the number 6, and the element of water. Her sign is the half moon. As a member of Form 6, you are a very balanced individual. You can easily adapt to most situations and you may be a good social chameleon. You aren't afraid of changes in your life, but sometimes you evolve too rapidly, leaving others to think that you are leaving them behind. Elfin are the best friends to have because they are open minded

this week was a little weird, cuz I kept forgetting what day is was, cuz I missed school on monday, and we don't have school on any friday this month...it just threw me off a little...

yesterday, I stayed after school and helped Elisa and Ali paint part of the backdrop, for the play, black. it was fun, the bottom of my feet turned black though, hehe.  every work party and almost everytime I stay after school and help with the play, I get paint on me...*blink blink* doesn't help that my mind has been in the gutter for the past week or two.

oh, and Justin's gonna break up with Tara...Tara's gonna move back in tonight...she's also, successfully joined the Navy... and she's leaving for five years now, instead of four *sigh*

another crappy thing is Mack's in the middle of switching internet services or something and I probably wont' get to talk to him until next weekend or something like that...so yeah

anywayz, tomorrow's another work party, fun stuff...I think Ali's gonna spend the night tonight, I don't know for sure though... 

yeah, well, that's all for now, talk at ye'll'z laterz

hugs an' kisses
love alwayz
- amber -

my throat hurts...really badly... kind of from screaming at the football game last night, but then kind of cuz I'm a li'l sick too.. yeah...we won the game...again... 

Ali's here...yeah... I wanna go to Hot Topic, and spend a whole bunch'a money...

there's another work party today, from 1-5, fun fun stuff, as long as we don't have to burn anymore styrofoam I'll be fine...then tomorrow me an' ali, we're goin' to Lisa's to videotape something for sign language..that'll be fun...yeah, anyway, that's all for now, talk at ye'll'z laterz

hugs an' kisses
love alwayz

okay, on Saturday, we had a work party for the Secret Garden...well, me, Ali, and Amy were put to work melting wanna be bricks into the styrofoam walls.  and that just created a gross disgusting gas..I don't remember what it's called...yeah, so we did that for about two hours or more, getting high off the gross disgusting smell...actually after a while it started smelling like a hippy shop...anyway, after we were done burning the styrofoam we had to help paint it...so being around two different toxic things wasn't very good for my brain...I've noticed that I've become a little more out of it...it sucks....stupid toxins....anyway, yeah, lovely way to start out my weekend...

well today, I got to fill in holes that my dog dug in the yard, that was loads of fun....yeah, anyway, I have to go take a shower and get all my stuff ready for school tomorrow, talk at ye'll'z laterz

hugs an' kisses
love alwayz
- amber -

blah, yeah I'm sick..it sucks ass.  and my last entry have numerous errors in it...I just noticed that...oh, well, I have a reason for it...

anyway...today was really boring and I was very tempted to fall asleep in every class except band, cuz it's almost impossible...er...improbable...sorry PotC thing....anyway, yeah, falling asleep in band doesn't work too well...

yeah, I got home, let snickers off his chain, went inside called mom, went back outside to water to the plants and snickers had a lovely gift in his mouth x_x...it was a rabbit ear...I wouldn't let him inside after I was done, even though he went and ate it...it was gross.....

oh! yesterday, after the stage meeting, after we took ali home, we went to the store to get a few things and I got Sleepy Hollow! I was so happy, that's a good movie...and Johnny Depp's a good actor, yeah ;) anyway, that's all for now talk at ye'll'z laterz

hugs an' kisses
love alwayz
- amber -

yeah, today was sucky...I have clarinet lessons every monday now, and my aunt sandi is supposed to me and meghan up for out lessons...school got out, looked for her car, didn't see it, neither did meghan...so we ride the bus...I wasn't feeling too good at this point...I get home...as I'm walking up the driveway, I hear the horn of sandi's car...damn...so I get bitched at by her and remember I feel like shit already, so she just makes me feel guilty...then we swung by her house to pick up meghan which had just got home, they had a little arguement in the car...I felt like crap so I couldn't play my clarinet as well as I'd've liked...plus I was using a new reed...

oh, an' during IS I got dizzy and it wasn't kewl....yeah...so anyway...my day got better when I talked to Mack, yeah...he tends to do that...make absolutely horrible better...love ya babe

anyway I'm'a go talk at ye'll'z laterz
hugs an' kisses
love alwayz
- amber -

Mack, I love you.

hugs an' kisses
love alwayz
- amber -

I'm hating school, like oh so much.  I have a damned health test tomorrow, I don't understand the last half of my math homework...then, I'm not liking home cuz the atmosphere is all tense cuz mom's pissed off at me cuz I've told her a thousand times who Lisa is and yet she still doesn't know and I wouldn't tell her...god I hate life...oh, and tara hasn't really said hi to me all week, it's like she's ignoring me or something, but yeah...

at least I got to talk to Mack yesterday for four hours, so that made me happy, then mom had to go and bitch at me...*sigh* what I wouldn't give to kill myself at the moment, or just to disappear for awhile...or go stay with Mack for a few weeks and deal all of his stress...oh that sounds like fun....*sigh*

*screams and pulls hair out.  takes a deep breath* okay...I think I'm fine now...actually, no, I'm not, but that's okay... cuz I've never really been okay...yeah, I need to study for that health test tomorrow, vent at ye'll'z laterz

hugs an' kisses
love alwayz
- amber -

yup, yet another day has gone by...woohoo...aaannnyyywayz, I have my second clarinet lesson today, twaz fun..I guess, yeah...

role playing is so much fun :) yeah, :P I wanna see PotC again...and OUATIM (Once Upon a Time in Mexico)

blah, I'm at a loss for words, so I'll talk at ye'll'z laterz

hugs an' kisses
love alwayz
- amber -

yeah, LJ hasn't let me post anything for the past week, so that's why there' no recent entries.

Anyway, to Friday after the band TV thing, I witnessed an accident, we almost ran over the dead guy in the middle of the road it was great fun.  If you want details just ask.

Saturday, I went to Joseph with dad and Tara.  We unloaded plants got twenty bucks each, watched movies all night.  yeah, all the basics.

Sunday, we drove home.  We were gonna stop at an Oregon Trail site, but dad missed the exit, so that never happened.

And this school week was just full of boredum, like seriously.  The football game was kind of fun, I screamed my ass off and my throat hurts from it now, but other than that it was fun.  oh yeah, and I'm dead tired, so I should go to bed soon.  Barlow won against Parkrose, 41 to zip.  Not like I was really paying attention, but yeah.

Okay, since I'm really tired, I'm'a gonna go ta bed now. talk at ye'll'z later'z

hugs an' kisses
love alwayz
- amber -

John Ritter, Johnny Cash, and Johnny Calcagno all died within the last two days.  John Ritter was the dad on 8 Simple Rules for Dating My Teenage Daughter, Johnny Cash was a great country legend, and Johnny Calcagno was a guy that graduated Barlow last year.  Deaths usually come in threes more often than not.  Mom told me that when I called her after I got home from school today.  Made me wonder.

Another crappy thing that's happened in the past two days..Mom's car stereo was stolen at the library of all places, with the dog in the car, and it was still light outside.  yeah, it sucked.  and we don't have the money to buy a new stereo at the moment, actually we really don't the money to do anything...but that's ok.

I don't really have any good news, so I'll talk at ye'll'z laterz

hugs an' kisses
love alwayz
- amber -

yeah, so I'm goin' to Joseph on Saturday with Dad and Tara I think...I think Tara's going anyway. yeah, so I won't be online all weekend, but whatever.  yeah, that's all, laterz
hugs an' kisses
love alwayz
- amber -

<lj-cut text="Love, Sex, and Arcadia">Love, Sex, and Arcadia
   
Dragons and sex.  Fights and unicorns.  Happy lives and sad endings.  Mad love and total hatred.  There's only one place where these things collide.  Arcadia.
   
Arcadia is known for having the wildest parties and the kinkiest clubs.  The perfect scenery and the cleanest streets.  But there's more to Arcadia than meets the eye.  It's the love and the hatred that tears at the core of the city.  Tears it apart.  After only being a lost city for fifty years, the current residents run off leaving it more of a lost city, a dead city, except for the dragons and the other mystical creatures that took up resident there.  

Dragon infested and buildings in ruin is mostly what's left of Arcadia.  It's something not one person would want to find because of the stories told about dragons.  About how they can be so vicious, yet nobody has actually come in contact with one in years.  The stories say that a single dragon could rip a man to pieces in only five seconds.  That they can con you into doing anything for them only to be eaten in return.  

Curiosity.  Never really a good thing.  Especially when new residents to the stories are wanting to find the lost city.  A couple actually thought about going to seek it out.  They were talked out of it by some people, talked back in to going by others.  Their final destination, after being conned in and out of going, was to be Arcadia.

This curious couple, each only fifteen, set off on their journey not knowing what they will find.  Along the way and at their destination.  They set off with food, water, clothes, and a map that a used to be a resident of Arcadia many years ago, gave them.  Their journey starts at DragonTown.  Funny name for a town that hasn't seen dragons in hundreds of years.  The map they carry is small and the distance between the two cities looks quite short, but appearances can be deceiving.  

"Why are we doing this again?" asks Mack, the boyfriend.  "I mean, do we really want to be face to face with a dragon?"

Amber (the girlfriend) looks at him awkwardly.  "You wanted to go too, you know," she states as she curls up next to him under the stars and the shimmering moon.  

"I know, but I don't know," he says as he wraps his arms tightly around his love.  She just nuzzles her face against his chest and closes her eyes, falling fast asleep.  Mack leans back, with Amber still tightly in his grip, and falls into a dream filled sleep.  

A dream filled sleep doesn't always mean the dreams are good.  For Mack is rudely awakened by an awful nightmare of vicious dragons and boiling fires.  Amber, awakened by his startled jump eagerly asks, "Babe, what's wrong?" He looks at Amber with frightened eyes and try's to catch his breath.  Gently touching her fingertips to his cheek, "What happened?" she asks softly, pulling him to her.  Quickly, he wraps his arms tight around her and presses his tear-filled eyes to her shoulder.  Soothingly, "It was only a dream, it'll be okay."  

"But you got burned by a dragon, then eaten alive.  I could hear your screams.  It felt so real.  I could feel the heat of the flames," he stammered.  She stroked his tearstained cheeks with her knuckles.

"It was just a dream, love.  It was only a dream."

"But it felt so real."  He stared at the disturbed ground as she took him back into her arms.  Amber held his shivering, sweat-covered body close to hers, calming him with every breath he took.  Soon, he was sleeping calmly in her arms, only leaving her in tears.  Tears of fear, because she didn't know what kind of hideous dragons they were to run in to.  She ended up crying herself to sleep as well.  

Morning came quickly.  They were woken by the brightly shining sun, blaring at their faces.  The first words of the morning were full of sweet-nothings, for the nightmare frightened them both to tears.  There were hugs and kisses in between cooking breakfast, folding and putting the blankets in their packs, and their plan of action for the day.  

The journey for the day, was getting to the nearest city.  The map said it was about thirteen miles away.  Zefan, was the name of the town they were to travel to.  They thought they could make it in a day because it was only thirteen miles, that's what the map said anyway.  But appearances are never as they seem.  They walked from dawn to dusk and Zefan was no where in site.  It was frustrating.  Only thirteen miles is what the map said.  Had they taken a wrong turn?  No, because all the landmarks that were on the map were staring them in the face.  Frustrated and tired they decided to make camp.  With a warm little fire and untrusting gray clouds floating above them.  

Rain starts pouring out of the dark, heavy clouds.  The fire slowly sizzles to coals.  They awake, drenched from the rain.  Looking at each other, cold and tired, exhausted and frustrated.  Amber heard the wind whisper, "Trust me."  She quickly remembered the dream she had had before awaking.  After crawling over to him, she touched her fingertips to his cheek and looked him over a few times.  Her eyes hungry for something more than he'd ever given her.  Hungry for him, for his body.  As she licked the rain off her lips, he pressed a passionate kiss on to her lips.  They let their tongues play, for it had been awhile since they really kissed each other with meaning.  

Their clothes no longer stuck to their bodies, but sprawled about their campsite.  Amber's breathing getting deeper and more uneven every time he went in.  Mack starts to move his hips a little faster and Amber lets a little cry, he wasn't sure if it was of pain or pleasure so he eased some.  She sucks in a gasp of air and lets it out in uneven exhales.  Lightly, she touches the tip of tongue briefly to his neck, then pushes her hips up as he enters her.  A cry is released from both of them, Amber's a little louder than Mack's.  Her hips fall back to the ground.  She takes shallow breaths, her chest rising uneven as her lungs are half filled with air.  For a short moment he rests his forehead against her chest, then he lets his lips gently lay a kiss against her skin.  Even breaths now flood her lungs.  He starts his rhythm again, slower and a little harder than before.  Immediately, the deep, uneven breaths return.  Amber slightly arches her back, only to slowly lower it back to the wet muddy ground.  Mack slows and exits Amber's body, he lays against her rain and sweat covered body.  Softly and gently, he presses his lips to hers, then lays his head on her chest.  Slowly, their heartbeats return to normal and they drift into a perfect sleep.

Amber's eyes slowly creep open.  Confused as to her whereabouts, she looks around.  Wrapped in a black satin sheet in a gothic tower, she swore she was dreaming.  Mack sleeping soundly, wrapped in the same sheet, rolled into Amber's body.  She looked at him and smiled.  Feeling his warmth and his touch, she knew she wasn't dreaming.  Grabbing a blanket from the floor and wrapping it around her naked body, she walks over to the window.  Outside, people are happy and chatting, but the buildings are tall and dark.  "Could this be Zefan?" she whispered to herself.  "Was my dream really true?"  

Mack finally awakes, quite confused himself, sees Amber looking out the window and wraps the black satin sheet around his waist.  He places his hands on her hips, startling her.  "Sorry.  Where are we?" he says as he kisses her neck.  

"I think we're in Zefan."

"So, it does exist?  But how?  I mean...how'd we end up here, when just last night we were making love on a muddy ground?"  

"There's," she pauses, "something I didn't tell you."  She's given a funny look.  "I had a dream before we woke up to the rain."  He becomes even more confused, "It was a dream about how to actually get to here.  To Zefan."  

"What are you talking about?"

Tears creep into her eyes, "I -"  A single tear slides down her cheek and is wiped away by Mack's thumb.  

"Sweetie?"

She presses her face to his bare chest, "I'm sorry."  He holds her tight.  "Mack, the dream, it told me how to get here.  It was strange."  He still wasn't understanding why Amber was crying or how they got there.  "It was the reason we, uh.."

"What?" he asked in disbelief, pushing her away to arms length, hands on her shoulders.  "So, you're saying that we had sex to get to this kinky little town, is that it?"  Anger was rising inside of him.  Amber collapsed to a sitting position on the floor, tears now pouring down her face.  "Did it mean anything to you?  Or was it just so that you could have a bed to sleep in, or a fire to sit in front of without it going out?  Or was it so you could be pampered?"  She looked up at him, ashamed of herself and hurt because of what he had said.  Mack walks over to the bed, pulls on his boxers and tosses the sheet onto the bed.  He finishes getting dressed, walks over to the door, opens it, and starts to walk through.

"I forgot about the dream," she said with a voice barely there.  Mack stopped in the threshold, "Once I felt your touch, your warmth, it just vanished from my thoughts."  She took a deep breath and looked at him with sad, depressed eyes.  He turned and looked at her for a moment, then turned back around and left to explore the town.  Her whole body fell to the hardwood floor, her body shook as she cried.  Eventually, she cried herself to sleep.

Mack walked through crowds of happy chattering people, but as he walked through them they seemed to sense his sadness and anger.  For they stopped him as he reached the center of the crowd.  "What?" he said a little aggravated.

"We know your troubles," an old lady said in a slight English accent.  "We know them very well."  Mack gave her a strange look, so she explained, "We can see what you see.  We can hear what you hear.  We know your every thought.  We know you are quite angry with your Amber."

"How'd you know her name?"

"We know."  </lj-cut>
